Rearrange Pages Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Create a tab control on the front panel and add at least one page so that it has a minimum of three pages. This function is not available with fewer than three pages. Right-click any of the tabs and select Rearrange Pages from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to change the order of the pages on a tab control.

In the dialog box, drag the page names in the Page List listbox to rearrange them on the front panel.
